location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Justin Sheil, HM Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran to Lieutenant Colonel Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that he is now required to issue passports 'vise'd by the Persian authorities in Bushire' to British subjects wishing to travel into the Persian interior.
